channel.title: [562] Shop Problem.... Please Help!
channel.description:
[u][b]Hello,[/b][/u] On my server I am having this problem with my shops, I am new to 562s,
So anyways.... Here is my problem, (THIS ONLY HAPPENS IN ONE SHOP!)
When I open my shop, And I go to buy a item it will give me the item. Just to the right of the item i am actually trying to buy...... This has happened with almost all of the sources I have tryed to use, and it is getting REALLY annoying......
If someone could get me a tutorial on it, for rs2hd. THAT WOULD BE EPIC!

item.title: [562] Shop Problem.... Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @ryanyukon199 ryanyukon199
item.description:
@ryanyukon199 wrote:

     public int[] Shop = {4151, 11284, 10828, 11730, 4087, 14479, 1079, 1093, 1113, 1127, 1147, 1163, 1201, 1067, 1081, 1101, 1115, 1137, 1153, [1191]>THIS IS THE GLITCHED ITEM!, 1323, 11732, 6737, 9185, 15241, 15243, 4587};
    public int[] ShopN = {100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100};

Also I found what item is glitched… It is the Iron Kite Shield
When I go to buy the iron Kite Shield It does not buy, i right click hit buy 1, Nothing happens…

Read full topic
